item.description:
Hello Everyone,

PLEASE NOTE NEW TIME, NEW VENUE AND WE ARE PLAYING LONGER (3 HOURS)

We will be meeting in the Charles River Park Complex in Boston in the WEST END part of BOSTON.

NEW ADDRESS
4 EMERSON PLACE
APT 1002
BOSTON, MA 02114

The location is across from Mass. General Hospital (off of Blossom Street)

Thank you

Edan Barshan



Rules:

PLEASE SAY "YES" ONLY IF YOU ARE SURE
PLEASE ARRIVE 15 MINUTES EARLY. GAME STARTS ON TIME
GAME TIME IS 3 HOURS.

EACH TEAM IS ASSIGNED A COMMENTATOR.

AT THE END OF EACH GAME, WE HOLD A COMMENTATOR SESSION FOR 10 MINUTES FOR EACH TEAM.
COMMENTATORS DISCUSS THE RISKS AND REWARDS TAKEN BY EACH TEAM MEMBER

THANK YOU

EDAN BARSHAN
ORGANIZER
item.name: The Metro Boston Cashflow August Meetup
